title: Café Stal HFD-16 Belmont 16 Cup Double Walled Cafetiere Coffee Maker, Mirror Finish, 2 Litre
features: 16 Cups - 2000ml (2L) 18/10stainless steel – mirror finish (cup sizes are demitasse)
Double walled body and lid – keeps your coffee hot and the outer walls cool to touch
Closable perfect pour spout – turn the lid to stop heat dissipation while your coffee diffuses
Insulated handle stays cool, tight fitting plunger strains coffee avoiding ground beans in your drink
Dish washer safe – fully guaranteed against manufacturing defects
description: This range of Café Stall Belmont silverware is not only stylish, but practical. Keeping your coffee warm and fresh whilst managing to attain that delicious coffee aroma and taste we all love so much. Thanks to the coffee makers available in the range, you can also control the temperature of your coffee, bonus. On top of this, the range of cafeterias features a highly polished 18/10 stainless-steel mirror finished body with a perfect non-drip spout. What are you waiting for? Look at the assortment now. Different sizes are available for your coffee needs. There is certainly something for every taste and occasion. Tips for use: Please do not overfill the container. The product is dishwasher safe, but hand washing is recommended for optimum quality maintenance. Established in 1945, The award-winning Grunwerg family business produces high quality household goods and catering products specializing in high quality steel. The company is headed by the Grunwerg family, which is located in the steel town of Sheffield. The guaranteed high-quality Grunwerg product range remains the first choice among professionals and renowned chefs in the food industry.
